Room.Name: Regalia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Regalia Road, just west of the Regalia Convent.
Room.LongDescription: This short road connects you with Marina Way to the east. Just past Marina Way is the Regalia Convent, a nunnary and school for women only. The Regalia Convent was formed by a grant by one of the large estate owners, but does not really follow any major religon. Instead, they strongly belive in a monotheistic philosophy, which is considered hypocritical to most of the other religious orders in Oceancrest.
